textID.Wiki: Key specified Item name, 1-line help ID. No key specified Category name ID. No text specified Not displayed in pad / key settings (operation list display only)

key.Wiki: User input key to be assigned. If not specified, it will be treated as a category display item.

enableUnassign.Wiki: Is it possible to unassign (default possible)

enablePadConfig.Wiki: Is it possible to change the pad operation assignment (default possible)?

enableMouseConfig.Wiki: Is it possible to change the mouse operation assignment (default possible)?

group.Wiki: Group for determining duplicate assignments. Cannot be duplicated in the same group

mappingTextID.Wiki: Item name to be displayed in the operation list. 0 Do not display in the list

viewPad.Wiki: Whether to display with key config (pad) (default display)

viewKeyboardMouse.Wiki: Whether to display with key config (mouse / keyboard) (default display)
